Question
========
A study investigates if the proportion of Dutch employees that has ever
stolen something from their workplace differs from the known relevant
European proportion. The researchers sample 550 Dutch employees and find
a percentage of 11.2%.  
  
With which proportion are they going to compare this sample proportion?

Answerlist
----------
* The sample proportion of employees that never stole anything from their
  workplace in the Netherlands.
* The population proportion of employees that never stole anything from
  their workplace in Europe.
* The population proportion of employees that has stolen something from
  their workplace in Europe.
* 0.50.

Solution
========










Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* True
* False
